title: How to Permanently Delete a Temu Account: Step-by-Step Guide

steps.title: Log into your account and click on your avatar.
steps.content: Log into your account and click on your avatar. On the Temu app, your user avatar is located at the bottom of the screen. On the Temu website, it is located in the top right corner of the screen. This will direct you to your user profile. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Navigate to “Account Security”, then click “Delete Your Temu Account”.
steps.content: Navigate to “Account Security”, then click “Delete Your Temu Account”. On the Temu App, first click “Settings”, then locate “Account Security”. On the Temu website, find “Account Security” on the left side of your profile. Then, scroll to the bottom of the page and click “Delete Your Temu Account.” [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click “I want to permanently delete my Temu account.”
steps.content: Click “I want to permanently delete my Temu account.” After you click “Delete Your Temu Account,” Temu will remind you to look through your account one more time to confirm you want to delete it. Make sure there are no incomplete or post-sale orders or other ongoing processes, as you will not be able to access them once your account has been deleted. If you’re sure you still want to delete the account, click the box next to “I want to permanently delete my Temu account,” then hit “Continue.” [3] X Research source Any available coupons and credits will also be deleted with your account, so make sure to use them before deleting your account. Be aware that you will no longer be able to make purchases on Temu’s app or website once your account has been deleted.

steps.title: Select the reason you want to delete your account.
steps.content: Select the reason you want to delete your account. When you click “Continue,” a pop-up titled “Reason for delete account” will appear. It includes a list of potential reasons you might want to delete your account, so choose the one that best fits. If you don’t want to provide a reason, select “I don’t want to provide a reason.” Then, you’ll be logged out and your account will be deleted within 7 business days. [4] X Research source You may have to verify your identity before the deletion is confirmed.

steps.title: Temu allegedly spies on users and sells their information.
steps.content: Temu allegedly spies on users and sells their information. Some Temu users believe the company spies on them through the in-app browser and that the spyware tracks their offsite behavior and records sensitive data like banking information, Social Security numbers, and mailing addresses. Some have even reported fraudulent charges on their bank account after using Temu. [5] X Research source In Temu’s privacy policy, it states that Temu doesn’t “sell” your information in the traditional sense, though it may share your information with various third-parties to provide better service. For a full list of potential parties, read the privacy policy . [6] X Research source

steps.title: Temu has faced copyright infringement lawsuits.
steps.content: Temu has faced copyright infringement lawsuits. Some listings on Temu are direct copies from the original product’s Amazon storefront, typically made without the store owners’ knowledge or approval. Because the prices are significantly lower than on Amazon, these products are likely knock-offs as well. Many Amazon sellers have since sued Temu for copyright infringement. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Temu may use false advertising to get users’ information.
steps.content: Temu may use false advertising to get users’ information. Many users think Temu’s partnerships and ads are questionable. Many promotions promise free mobile games or money to those who sign up for the site and input their personal information, which Temu can then use to advertise and promote their services. Essentially, Temu pays users to use their personal data however they see fit, which makes many people feel uneasy. [8] X Research source One of Temu’s policies for a $50 cash reward states, “Except to the extent prohibited by applicable law, participation in the Program and/or receipt or use of Rewards constitutes a Member’s consent for Sponsor to use and publish such Member’s photo, name likeness, voice, opinions, statements, biographical information, and/or hometown and state for promotional or advertising purposes in any media worldwide, now known or hereafter developed, in perpetuity without further review, notification, payment, or consideration.” [9] X Research source Scammers also often create fake ads of celebrities and influencers “promoting” Temu to get new users to sign up with a referral code. The scammers then get the money from the referral and sometimes send fake “leaked” photos of the celebrities to those who used the code. While this may not be Temu’s fault, its users’ safety is still threatened.

steps.title: Temu is not BBB accredited and has a low BBB score.
steps.content: Temu is not BBB accredited and has a low BBB score. Temu currently has a score of C+ on the Better Business Bureau, and many reports discuss their poor customer service experiences with the company. They state that it’s difficult to get a refund, as refunds are often delayed or outright denied. [10] X Trustworthy Source Better Business Bureau Nonprofit organization dedicated to promoting marketplace trustworthiness by educating consumers and reviewing businesses Go to source

steps.title: Temu deletes all your data and content when you delete your account.
steps.content: Temu deletes all your data and content when you delete your account. After you click “Delete Your Temu Account,” Temu states that it will delete your data and content in accordance with its Privacy Policy and applicable law. This data includes communication records, files, images, and any unused credits and coupons. [11] X Research source This also includes information like your account details (username, email address, mailing address, etc.), order history, wish lists, and payment methods.

steps.title: Log into your account within 7 days of deletion to restore it.
steps.content: Log into your account within 7 days of deletion to restore it. If you regret deleting your Temu account, it’s a quick fix. Simply log back into your accounts before the 7 business days are up, click “Cancel deletion request” on the pop-up, and all of your data will be restored. If you miss the deadline, you’ll need to create a new account. [12] X Research source Temu will send you a confirmation email when the 7 days are up.
